title: China Lavish Lakeside Escape with Three Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description: Alongside Dianchi Lake, InterContinental Kunming, an IHG Hotel, is a picturesque retreat that offers breathtaking vistas and the chance to connect with nature. Enjoy Cantonese cuisine at the onsite Shang Tao restaurant, explore the locales of Dianchi and Xishan or head into Kunming to discover fragrant flower markets and tranquil temples. As the sun sets, lounge in luxury in a lavish guest room or explore the bars and craft breweries of Kunming to discover this delightful city after dark.
offer_address: No. 5 Yijing Road, Xishan District, Kunming, Yunnan, 650228, China

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Kunming Ancient Dian Town
title: Kunming City Stay near Dian Lake & Waterfront Theme Park
description: Located beside Dian Lake, Crowne Plaza Kunming Ancient Dian Town, an IHG Hotel, is perfectly placed to discover the wonders of this South China city, famed for its natural scenery - from bamboo forests to stone karsts - and extraordinary flower market. Energise yourself at the indoor pool or fitness centre before savouring delectable cuisine at Dian Cafe 1887. Relish the Yunnan sunshine with a stroll alongside the lake or head to the nearby theme park for excitement for all ages.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Kunming Ancient Dian Town, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.18 Huanhu South Road, Jinning District, Kunming 650600, China

title: Refined Stay in the Heart of Downtown Kunming
description: Elegant, modern and offering a tranquil stay, Crowne Plaza Kunming City Centre, an IHG Hotel, is ideally located in the Yunnan capital's central business district. Awaken refreshed and ready to explore this dynamic city - discover fragrant flower markets, explore energetic shopping streets or enjoy nearby entertainment venues. Invigorate your body in the hotel's fitness centre then sate your appetite by savouring steaks seared to perfection at Wildfire Restaurant or traditional delicacies at Camellia Chinese Restaurant.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Kunming City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.399 QingNian Road, Wuhua District, Kunming 650011, China
